about.title: DIY Security Lab Manifesto
about.subtitle: Bitcoin, Freedom, and Sovereignty
manifest: At DIY Sec Lab, we deeply believe in Bitcoin as a tool for individual emancipation. It is not just a digital currency, but a symbol of freedom and sovereignty, allowing each person to take control of their own destiny without relying on intermediaries or centralized institutions.

We know that true freedom is only possible with security. That is why we advocate for the offline storage of cryptocurrencies, where the user is the sole guardian of their assets. Our commitment is to facilitate this process, making it accessible for everyone to protect their funds independently and securely, away from digital threats.

Bitcoin paves the way for a future where power returns to the hands of the people. At DIY Sec Lab, our mission is to support this journey by providing the tools and knowledge necessary for each individual to live this sovereignty with confidence, simplicity, and responsibility. We believe that Bitcoin is the key to true autonomy, and we are here to help open that door.

2.title: HOW TO ADD A PASSWORD AND CREATE THE ISCA WALLET

3.title: RECOVER YOUR WALLET AND SEND BITCOIN
3.description: Learn how to recover your wallet and send Bitcoin easily, while keeping full control of your funds.

7.description: Learn how to verify the Krux code to ensure the security of your digital transactions.

8.description: Create your SeedQR securely to protect your data and cryptocurrencies.

9.description: Safely back up your data on Tiny Seed and never lose your important information.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
text: Your privacy is essential to us. It is the policy of DIY Security Lab to respect your privacy regarding any information we may collect on the site https://www.diyseclab.io and other sites we operate.

We collect personal information only when we truly need it to provide a service. We do so fairly and legally, with your knowledge and consent. We also inform you of the purpose for which we are collecting this information and how it will be used.

We retain the collected information only for as long as necessary to provide the requested service. When we store data, we use commercially acceptable means to prevent loss, theft, unauthorized access, disclosure, copying, use, or modification.
We do not publicly disclose personally identifiable information or share it with third parties, except as required by law.

Our site may contain links to external sites that are not operated by us. Be aware that we have no control over the content and practices of these sites and cannot assume responsibility for their respective privacy policies.
You are free to decline our request for personal information, understanding that we may not be able to provide some of the desired services if you do.

Continued use of our site will be considered acceptance of our privacy practices and handling of personal information. If you have any questions about how we handle user data and personal information, please contact us.
